server.util

Class ServerPlayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.definitions.Player
      • server.util.ServerPlayer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AIBase

    public class ServerPlayer
extends Player
    class that holds all the attributes of a player for the server inherits from the Player
    Author:
    Brennen
